DataVersion.description: Specifies the default data version of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

EventType.description: Specifies the default event type of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Subject.description: Specifies the default subject of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

DataVersion.description: Specifies the data version of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

EventTime.description: Specifies the event time of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

EventType.description: Specifies the event type of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Id.description: Specifies the id of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Subject.description: Specifies the subject of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Topic.description: Specifies the topic of the EventGrid Event to associate with the domain. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

InputSchema.description: Specifies the schema in which incoming events will be published to this domain. Allowed values are `cloudeventv01schema`, `customeventschema`, or `eventgridschema`. Defaults to `eventgridschema`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the EventGrid Domain resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which the EventGrid Domain exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
